select t.id, t.title, t.cover_url, t.area_code, r.title as areaTitle, t.detail_address, t.latitude, t.longitude, t.create_time, t.update_time, s.title as typeTitle from poi_point t left join poi_area r on t.area_code = r.code left join poi_type s on t.type_id = s.id where t.deleted = false
and t.area_code = #{param.areaCode}
and t.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%')
order by id desc
